title.rendered: The White Heron beckons – A special edition bottle of Hibiki 17 year old

content.rendered: The White Heron beckons – A special edition bottle of Hibiki 17 year old with a hand painted label by Japanese artist Shirasagi which depicts an Egret, a type of heron native to Japan.
